short_summary: Maintenance services of the rotating and swinging doors at the John H Chapman Space Center
description: The Canadian Space Agency intends to retain the services of a contractor for the maintenance of the rotating and swinging doors
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title: Maintenance Services for Rotating and Swinging Doors
### English: Maintenance services of the rotating and swinging doors
### French: Services d’entretiens des portes rotatives et battantes
## Reference Number: cb-8834-30679604
## Amendment Number: 4
## Solicitation Number: 9F030-20200543
## Publication Date: 2023-09-07
## Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-28
## Amendment Date: 2023-09-28
## Contract Details:
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None
## Tender Status: Expired
## Category: SRV (Service)
## Notice Type: Request for Proposal, Competitive - Open Bidding
## Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
## Location: 
* Region of Opportunity: Longueuil, Quebec
* Region of Delivery: Longueuil, Quebec
## Contracting Entity:
* Canadian Space Agency
* Address: 6767 route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, QC, J3Y8Y9, Canada
## Contact Information:
* Jamie Roy, jamie.roy@asc-csa.gc.ca, (514) 231-3498
## Tender Description:
The Canadian Space Agency is seeking a contractor to provide maintenance services for the rotating and swinging doors at the John H. Chapman Space Center located in Longueuil, Quebec. The contract is for maintenance services, open to competitive bid.

## Documents:
You can download the following documents: 
* [9F030-20200543 - rfp - rotating and swinging doors.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8834/9f030-20200543-rfp-rotating-and-swinging-doors.pdf)
* [9F030-20200543_amend-1 – maintenance services of the rotating and swinging doors.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8834/9f030-20200543_amend-1_-maintenance-services-of-the-rotating-and-swinging-doors..pdf)

```

Note that I've removed some unnecessary information, corrected grammar and rephrased the entry for clarity. 

I have also rewritten the Entry using Markdown to make it more readable. I'm assuming that this is for a Canadian organization
